alert.note: Alert for Caguas; Canovanas; Ceiba; Fajardo; Gurabo; Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Luquillo; Naguabo; Rio Grande; San Lorenzo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 27 at 4:19PM ADT until October 27 at 7:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Caguas County in Puerto Rico... Canovanas County in Puerto Rico... Ceiba County in Puerto Rico... Fajardo County in Puerto Rico... Gurabo County in Puerto Rico... Humacao County in Puerto Rico... Juncos County in Puerto Rico... Las Piedras County in Puerto Rico... Luquillo County in Puerto Rico... Naguabo County in Puerto Rico... Rio Grande County in Puerto Rico... San Lorenzo County in Puerto Rico... * Until 630 PM AST. * At 319 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 3 inches in 3 hours. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Fajardo, Juncos, Las Piedras, Humacao, Naguabo, Gurabo, San Lorenzo, Rio Grande, Canovanas, Ceiba, Luquillo, Caguas, Loiza, Vieques, La Fermina, Anton Ruiz, Campo Rico, Celada, La Dolores and Punta Santiago. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1-3 INCHES IN 3 HOURS
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

area.areaDesc: Caguas; Canovanas; Ceiba; Fajardo; Gurabo; Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Luquillo; Naguabo; Rio Grande; San Lorenzo
